description: The continued use of the Pascal programming language is attributed to its support for structured programming, data structures and its consistent use of loops and conditional structures. As a result, Pascal is considered by some to be a preferred language for programming instructions. We have designed this foundational course to teach you how to develop applications using Pascal with first-hand programming practices.

courseDescription:
There are several programs to choose from if you want to be an adept applications developer. Pascal programming language is known for its strength in implementing conditionals and control structures. Therefore, this course has been designed to teach app development using Pascal, a language considered to be the foundation of well-known industry-standard applications. We begin by teaching you the fundamentals of Pascal programming: you will first discover how to set up Pascal and write your first program using mathematical operators.

Variables are essential programming components since they allow you to save data for later use. We show you how to declare and use different types of variables and constants in your program and how to use conditionals to write Pascal programs that make decisions based on predefined terms. You will learn how to use loops and string functions in your programs, as well as how to create records. Finally, we will demonstrate how to work with Pascal files, use the daytime functions, and create and use arguments.

This course is designed primarily for those without prior knowledge of Pascal programming. We will walk you through Pascal's components, features and elements step-by-step. From the fundamentals to advanced concepts such as conditionals, loops, arrays, and more, we've embedded Pascal source code and simple projects to help you understand various programming concepts. This course is ideal for anyone looking to begin a career in programming.
